t: I Spend 8 Hours a Day on Amazon, Here's My Top Tips for Avoiding Scams and Fake Products
s: Typically, sold by Amazon or the name brand of the item you are buying are safer bets. Bad or Unrealistic Reviews: A product’s reviews can be your North Star. Notice lots of spelling errors or multiple reviews submitted on the same date? Those could signal fake comments.

t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: If you meet all eligibility requirements, enroll your brand in the Transparency program. Use the same credentials you use to log in to the Brand Registry portal. If your brand is already enrolled, log in to the Transparency portal to enroll products and add users to your account.

t: A Quick Guide on Amazon Counterfeit Products 2025
s: Counterfeit products on Amazon refer to fake, imitation, or knockoff products sold under the name of a genuine product or brand.
